newHere.description.one: PetStay is a space for everyone who loves pets.
newHere.description.two: Here, you can find trustworthy pet sitters,
newHere.description.three: and participate in various community activities!
welcomeBack.two: Log in now to check out the latest news and updates from the PetStay community.
welcomeBack.three: Spend happier times with your pets.
login.error: Login error: Please check your username or password.
signup.success: Registration successful! Redirecting to the login page.
selectAnimalType: Please select at least one type of animal.
career: Please fill in your career details.
